raw akas.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
Batman: A bátor és a vakmerõ

akas: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (original title)
Batman: Os Bravos e Destemidos Brazil
Batman: Oi nees peripeteies Greece (transliterated ISO-LATIN-1 title)
Batman: A bátor és a vakmerõ Hungary
akas from release info: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (original title)
Batman: Os Bravos e Destemidos Brazil
Batman: Oi nees peripeteies Greece (transliterated ISO-LATIN-1 title)
Batman: A bátor és a vakmerõ Hungary

1.title: Death Race to Oblivion!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

1.plot: Batman and Captain Marvel deal with Blockbuster. Later, Mogul forces Batman to races both heroes and villains with the fate of the world at stake.

2.title: Long Arm of the Law!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

2.plot: Batman and Plastic Man team up to save some scouts. Later, the two have must deal with Rubberneck and Kite Man who are targeting Plastic Man's family in a scheme for revenge.

3.title: Revenge of the Reach!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

3.plot: The Challengers of the Unknown go to the island and are exposed to Starro. Later, Blue Beetle runs into trouble on Oa when the Green Lantern Corp try to arrest him for possessing the scarab.

4.title: Aquaman's Outrageous Adventure!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

4.plot: Batman and Enemy Ace stop aliens interfering in the past. Later, Aquaman takes his family on vacation and must resist his desire to fight crime.

5.title: The Golden Age of Justice!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

5.plot: Batman and Detective Chimp work together to foil Falseface. Later, Batman and the Justice Society of America face off with Per Degaton.

6.title: Sidekicks Assemble!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

6.plot: Robin, Speedy, and Aqualad team up to earn respect and stop Ra's Al Ghul from attacking the world.

7.title: Clash of the Metal Men!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

7.plot: Aquaman falls to Starro. Meanwhile, Batman teams up with the Metal Men to defeat Chemo and, then, to save Doc Magnus from a team of powerful living gases.

8.title: A Bat Divided!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

8.plot: The Riddler torments Booster Gold and Batman. Later, Batman bears witness to the creation of Firestorm. Unfortunately, in the explosion, Batman is divided into three different aspects of himself.

9.title: The Super-Batman of Planet X!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

9.plot: Batman and the Metal Men fight Kanjar Ro. Later, Batman goes to the planet Zur-En-Arrh where he meets another Batman and develops superpowers.

10.title: The Power of Shazam!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

10.plot: When Captain Marvel's enemies Black Adam and Dr Sivana team up, Marvel enlists Batman to aid him.

11.title: Chill of the Night!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

11.plot: Batman and Zatanna make short work of Abra Kadabra. Later, Batman must choose between justice and vengeance when he confronts Joe Chill the man who murdered his parents.

12.title: Gorillas in Our Midst!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

12.plot: Batman and Spectre deal with Dr. Milo. Later, Batman and Detective Chimp enlist Vixen and B'wana Beast in order to battle a conspiracy of ape villains: Gorilla Grodd, Gorilla Boss, and Monsieur Mallah.

13.title: The Siege of Starro!: Part 1

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

13.plot: Led by Faceless Hunter, the Starro Invasion comes on full swing. Only Batman and a handful of unlikely heroes remain uninfected to thwart the alien parasites and their mind-controlled hosts before all of Earth is sucked dry.

14.title: The Siege of Starro!: Part 2

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

14.plot: Star Conqueror may be defeated, but Faceless Hunter is not! The alien warrior manipulates B'Wana Beast, forcing him to combine thetiny starros into one massive beast he plans to use to destroy the planet! But Batman has his own back-up - the Metal Men!

15.title: Requiem for a Scarlet Speedster!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

15.plot: Barry Allen has long been presumed dead and his "ghost" has been haunting Jay Garrick and Kid Flash. When Batman sees it to, they realize he's not dead -- he's been kidnapped by Reverse Flash!

16.title: The Last Patrol!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

16.plot: The disunited super hero group "The Doom Patrol" must now unite once again to face their former enemies who have suddenly united against them.

17.title: Menace of the Madniks!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

17.plot: Booster Gold misses his late best bud, Blue Beetle, but when he travels back in time to hang with him, he throws the present into chaos.

18.title: Emperor Joker!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

18.plot: Fifth-dimensional fan boy Bat-Mite inadvertently gives Joker his limitless power while hoping to witness a hero-villain showdown.

19.title: The Criss-Cross Conspiracy!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

19.plot: The long-retired Batwoman sees an opportunity for revenge against the villain who humiliated her: Riddler. In order to get back at him, she uses sorcerer Felix Faust to swap her body with Batmans. It's "Batman" vs,. Batwoman" vs. Riddler.

20.title: Plague of the Prototypes!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

20.plot: Batman sends a new squad of bat-robots against Black Mask. The robots are turned against their former master when Black Mask hacks into them. Batman prepares to fight the robots with his dog partner, Ace. They are also joined with the kindly robot prototype "Proto".

21.title: Cry Freedom Fighters!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

21.plot: When an alien race tries to invade Earth, Batman, Plastic Man and the Freedom Fighters race to their planet to stop them. Thealien's numbers prove overwhelming and it falls on Plastic Man to find the patriotism within to stop them.

22.title: The Knights of Tomorrow!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

22.plot: It is the story of Batman's retirement and his marriage to Catwoman. Bruce Wayne now hopes that his son Damian will follow in his footsteps, and his confidence in him will be put to the test.

23.title: Darkseid Descending!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

23.plot: The threat of an impending invasion from Apokolips compels Batman, Aquaman, and Martian Manhunter to form a new Justice League.

24.title: The Mask of Matches Malone!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

24.plot: Batman, Huntress and Black Canary are after Two-Face - and so is Catwoman. While incognito, Batman gets amnesia and believes himself to be a real gangster - now the girls must stop him AND Two- Face!

25.title: Bat-Mite Presents: Batman's Strangest Cases!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

25.plot: Bat-Mite hosts a series of Batman's most bizarre adventures including the Mad Magazine-inspired Batboy and Rubin, a Japanese-influenced Bat-Manga and a guest starring role from the Scooby Gang and Weird Al Yankovic.

26.title: The Malicious Mr. Mind!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

26.plot: Batman joins forces with Captain Marvel, Mary Marvel, and Captain Marvel Jr. to take on Dr. Sivana and his Monster Society of Evil. However, the villains gain the most likely of newcomers -- the wormlike Mr. Mind.

1.title: Rise of the Blue Beetle!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

1.plot: Batman and the Blue Beetle attempt to stop an asteroid but end up on a distant planet fighting Kanjar Ro.

2.title: Terror on Dinosaur Island!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

2.plot: Batman and Plastic Man must stop Gorilla Grodd from using a machine that will turn all humans into primates.

3.title: Evil Under the Sea!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

3.plot: Batman visits Aquaman during an investigation into some unusual seismic activity. There he discovers that Aquaman's brother Orm is working with Black Manta to conquer Atlantis.

4.title: Invasion of the Secret Santas!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

4.plot: After taking care of Sportsmaster with the Blue Beetle, Batman teams up with Red Tornado in order to stop the villain Fun Haus from ruining Christmas.

5.title: Day of the Dark Knight!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

5.plot: After teaming up with Guy Gardner, Batman travels into the past with Green Arrow to stop Morgaine Le Fay from conquering Camelot.

6.title: Enter the Outsiders!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

6.plot: Batman and Wildcat face off against a trio of super-powered teenagers who are attacking symbols of consumerism.

7.title: Dawn of the Dead Man!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

7.plot: Trapped in a coffin, Batman must take astral form in order to stop the Gentleman Ghost from raising an army of the criminal undead.

8.title: Fall of the Blue Beetle!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

8.plot: The Blue Beetle is determined to learn the fate of his predecessor, Ted Kord.

9.title: Journey to the Center of the Bat!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

9.plot: Atom and Aquaman shrink down and enter Batman's body in order to help him fight off a chemical infection.

10.title: The Eyes of Despero!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

10.plot: Batman helps Guy Gardner and the remnants of the Green Lantern Corps fight against a would-be galactic conqueror.

11.title: Return of the Fearsome Fangs!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

11.plot: When three of his former classmates kill their former martial arts teacher, Batman enlists the help of fellow student Bronze Tiger to stop them from stealing the powerful Wudang Totem that the elderly sensei was guarding.

12.title: Deep Cover for Batman!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

12.plot: The Red Hood, a hero from an alternate dimension, enlists the Dark Knight's help against the Injustice Syndicate, a team of supervillains who are doppelgangers of Batman's friends back home.

13.title: Game Over for Owlman!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

13.plot: After his evil counterpart from an alternate dimension undertakes a crime spree disguised as him, Batman finds help from an unexpected ally.

14.title: Mystery in Space!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

14.plot: A melancholy Aquaman accompanies Batman to the planet Rann, where they aid Adam Strange in his fight against the Gordanians.

15.title: Trials of the Demon!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

15.plot: Magically transported to 19th century London, Batman aids Etrigan the Demon and Sherlock Holmes in battling Gentleman Jim Craddock, the future Gentleman Ghost.

16.title: Night of the Huntress!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

16.plot: While on the trail of mobsters Babyface and Mrs. Manface, Blue Beetle develops a crush on the sultry Huntress.

17.title: Menace of the Conqueror Caveman!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

17.plot: Batman gets the unwelcome aid of the profit-seeking Booster Gold in his efforts to stop Kru'll the Eternal.

18.title: The Color of Revenge!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

18.plot: Crazy Quilt is blinded by a young Robin. Years later, he comes to Blüdhaven looking for revenge.

19.title: Legends of the Dark Mite!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

19.plot: Batman finds himself idolized by a powerful being from the fifth dimension.

20.title: Hail the Tornado Tyrant!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

20.plot: The robotic superhero Red Tornado builds a "son" named Tornado Champion, but Batman's concerns are realized when the new robot turns itself into a villain named Tornado Tyrant.

21.title: Duel of the Double Crossers!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

21.plot: Plucked from time by Mongul, Jonah Hex brings Batman to Warworld to fight in gladiatorial competitions.

22.title: The Last Bat on Earth!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

22.plot: Batman pursues Gorilla Grodd into the future, where he enlists Kamandi's help against Grodd and his ape army.

23.title: When OMAC Attacks!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

23.plot: Hawk & Dove help Batman stop an intergalactic war. Later, Batman and OMAC team up to stop an attack by Shrapnel.

24.title: Inside the Outsiders!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

24.plot: Batman and Green Arrow team up to retrieve a pair of statues stolen by Catwoman. Later, Batman tries to free the Outsiders from one of Psycho Pirate's machines.

25.title: Mayhem of the Music Meister!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

25.plot: The Music Meister uses his ability to control minds in an effort to take over the world.

26.title: The Fate of Equinox!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

26.plot: After a battle with Two-Face, Batman and Dr. Fate must deal with Equinox who is attempting to replace both the Lords of Order and the Lords of Chaos.

1.title: Battle of the Superheroes!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

1.plot: When Superman is affected by Red Kryptonite he becomes a super jerk. Batman must stop him from destroying his reputation and more.

2.title: Joker: The Vile and the Villainous!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

2.plot: The Joker teams up with his criminal hero and inspiration, The Weeper, to take down their arch-nemesis Batman in this Jokerized episode where the roles are reversed.

3.title: Shadow of the Bat!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

3.plot: Bat-Ape rescues Batman and Robin from Catwoman. Later, Batman is bitten by a vampire and turns on his friends in the Justice League International.

4.title: Night of the Batmen!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

4.plot: Batman and Vigilante have a run in with some villains. Later Aquaman, Captain Marvel, Plastic Man, and Green Arrow try to fill in when Batmen is injured.

5.title: The Scorn of the Star Sapphire!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

5.plot: Hal Jordan, the Green Lantern, comes to Batman for help in defeating his nemesis, the beautiful supervillain Star Sapphire.

6.title: Time Out for Vengeance!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

6.plot: The Creeper cheers on and helps Batman when he's fighting Hellgrammite. Then, the Justice League International travels to the past to stop the minions of Equinox from wiping out all the incarnations of Batman throughout time.

7.title: Sword of the Atom!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

7.plot: Searching the Amazon jungle for the missing Ray Palmer, the scientist who was at one time The Atom, Batman disappears. Now Aquaman recruits the new Atom, Ryan Choi, to help shrink him down to microscopic size...

8.title: Triumvirate of Terror!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

8.plot: After the world's greatest baseball game against the Legion of Doom, Batman, Superman and Wonder Woman face off against their arch-enemies Joker, Lex Luthor and Cheetah, who gain the upper hand by switching their respective opponents.

9.title: Bold Beginnings!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

9.plot: After a team up with Space Ghost and his companions, Batman must come to the aid of three of his fellow superheroes who have fallen into the icy clutches of Mr. Freeze.

10.title: Powerless!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

10.plot: Captain Atom joins the Justice League, but has to learn how to continue being a super hero even after losing his powers to his old enemy Major Force.

11.title: Crisis: 22,300 Miles Above Earth!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

11.plot: While the Justice Society is visiting the Justice League for the first time, Batman is in Asia infiltrating a secret fortress where Ra's Al Ghul is plotting a new scheme for world domination.

12.title: Four-Star Spectacular!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

12.plot: Batman teams up with DC characters Adam Strange, the Flash, 'Mazing Man and the Creature Commandos in four separate teaser vignettes.

13.title: Mitefall!

episode of.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold (TV Series 2008–2011)

13.plot: Bat-Mite tries to make the show so horrible it has to be cancelled.

imdb.plot outline: Batman isn't going at it alone this time! From Warner Bros. Animation comes the latest interpretation of the classic Batman franchise. Our caped crusader is teamed up with heroes from across the DC Universe, delivering nonstop action and adventure with a touch of comic relief. Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Aquaman and countless others will get a chance to uphold justice alongside Batman. Though still based in Gotham, Batman will frequently find himself outside city limits, facing situations that are both unfamiliar and exhilarating. With formidable foes around every corner, Batman will still rely on his stealth, resourcefulness and limitless supply of cool gadgets to bring justice home.
imdb.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
plot: An updated animated series centering on the Caped Crusader himself as he partners and deals with his fellow superheroes in the DC Comics universe.::tb4000

Batman isn't going at it alone this time! From Warner Bros. Animation comes the latest interpretation of the classic Batman franchise. Our caped crusader is teamed up with heroes from across the DC Universe, delivering nonstop action and adventure with a touch of comic relief. Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Aquaman and countless others will get a chance to uphold justice alongside Batman. Though still based in Gotham, Batman will frequently find himself outside city limits, facing situations that are both unfamiliar and exhilarating. With formidable foes around every corner, Batman will still rely on his stealth, resourcefulness and limitless supply of cool gadgets to bring justice home.::Warner Bros. Animation
